com.leonovich.cofeebreak.web.controller

Class AppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leonovich.cofeebreak.web.controller.AppController

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/coffeebreak")
@PropertySource(value="classpath:messages.properties")
public class AppController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by alexanderleonovich on 29.08.15. Controller of application. Contains methods, what perform the function of show coffe menu, all cicles of creating order and other

        @RequestMapping(value="/add/to/order",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView addToOrder(org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView model,
                                                                     @ModelAttribute(value="coffee")

                                                                     @ModelAttribute(value="number")

                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                        throws WebException

        Parameters:
        coffee - sort of coffee, what user choose
        number - number of cups of sort of coffee
        request - HttpServletrequest from client
        model - Spring Model for work with attributes of request and choose view for response.

        model object (model of data and view)
